articles.description: It is time for England and manager Gareth Southgate to deliver when their Euro 2024 campaign begins on Sunday, writes Phil McNulty.
articles.title: Euro 2024: England and Gareth Southgate must deliver in tournament

articles.description: Police say they shot and injured the man, ahead of a Euro 2024 match between the Netherlands and Poland.
articles.title: Man with axe attacks police in Hamburg ahead of Euros match

articles.description: Listen as Scotland head coach Steve Clarke holds a media conference in the build-up to their second Euro 2024 match, against Switzerland on Wednesday.
articles.title: Euro 2024: Scotland v Switzerland build-up

articles.description: Emma Raducanu turns down the chance to play for Great Britain at the 2024 Olympics - but two-time gold medallist Andy Murray is set to compete.
articles.title: Paris 2024 Olympics: Emma Raducanu snubs wild card, Andy Murray in

articles.description: Australia's Travis Head proves to be England's unlikely saviour in St Lucia to allow Jos Buttler's side to progress to the Super 8s.
articles.title: T20 World Cup: England rescued by old Ashes foe Travis Head

articles.description: The 2020 US Open champion Bryson DeChambeau takes a three-shot lead over Rory McIlroy and Patrick Cantlay into Sunday's final round.
articles.title: US Open 2024: Bryson DeChambeau leads Rory McIlroy and Patrick Cantlay by three

articles.description: Follow live text commentary, score updates and match stats from Italy vs Albania in the UEFA Euro 2024
articles.title: Italy vs Albania: UEFA Euro 2024 - BBC Sport

articles.description: England captain Harry Kane says this summer's European Championships are the Three Lions' best chance of winning a major trophy.
articles.title: Harry Kane: England captain says Euros is best chance of winning a trophy

articles.description: England qualify for the T20 World Cup Super 8s after Australia battle past an excellent Scotland side in St Lucia.
articles.title: T20 World Cup results: England make Super 8s after Australia beat Scotland

articles.description: Spanish football expert Guillem Balague looks at Lamine Yamal's rise to becoming the youngest player in European Championship history.
articles.title: Euro 2024: Lamine Yamal makes history for Spain against Croatia
